short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Prevents you from shopping on Amazon by hiding checkout buttons and prices.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Finally here is an extension for you or your family to prevent impulsive buying on Amazon. It automatically hides prices of products and removes 'Add to Cart' and 'Checkout' buttons.
